ci_support_linux_64_cuda_compiler_versio:

- '14'

- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main

- cuda-nvcc

- '12.9'

- gxx

- '14'

- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
pytorch:
- '2.8'
target_platform:
- linux-64

- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
  - c_stdlib_version
  - cuda_compiler_version

raw_meta_yaml:
# see github.com/conda-forge/conda-forge.github.io/issues/1059 for naming discussion
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: 2.1.2
  build_number: 16
  torch_proc_type: ${{ "cuda" if cuda_compiler_version != "None" else "cpu" }}
  build_string_prefix: ${{ ("cuda" ~ (cuda_compiler_version | replace(".", ""))) if cuda_compiler_version != "None" else "cpu" }}

package:
  name: pytorch_scatter
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/t/torch_scatter/torch_scatter-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 69b3aa435f2424ac6a1bfb6ff702da6eb73b33ca0db38fb26989c74159258e47

build:
  number: ${{ build_number }}
  string: ${{ build_string_prefix }}_py${{ python | version_to_buildstring }}_h${{ hash }}_${{ build_number }}

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - if: cuda_compiler_version != "None"
      then: 
        - ${{ compiler('cuda') }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - pytorch
        - pytorch * [build=${{ torch_proc_type }}*]
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - pytorch
    - pytorch * [build=${{ torch_proc_type }}*]
    - pytest-runner
    - if: cuda_compiler_version != "None"
      then:
        - cuda-version ==${{ cuda_compiler_version }}
        - libcusparse-dev
        - libcublas-dev
        - libcusolver-dev
  run:
    - python
    # - python-wget
    - pytorch * [build=${{ torch_proc_type }}*]

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - torch_scatter

about:
  summary: PyTorch Extension Library of Optimized Scatter Operations
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: https://github.com/rusty1s/pytorch_scatter
  repository: https://github.com/rusty1s/pytorch_scatter

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - Tobias-Fischer
    - mxr-conda
    - rluria14
    - oblute
    - ndmaxar
    - benjaminrwilson

about.summary: PyTorch Extension Library of Optimized Scatter Operations
